name: firefox-launch
description: Extenision that enables the user to launch Firefox from the other browser

scripts.test: npm run build && c8 mocha test/**/*.test.js
scripts.zip:firefox: web-ext build --source-dir build/firefox --artifacts-dir build/artifacts --overwrite-dest --filename=firefox.zip --ignore-files=interfaces shared/backgroundScripts pages/welcomePage/script.js browser-polyfill.js
scripts.zip:chromium: web-ext build --source-dir build/chromium --artifacts-dir build/artifacts --overwrite-dest --filename=chromium.zip --ignore-files=interfaces shared/backgroundScripts pages/welcomePage/script.js browser-polyfill.js
scripts.build: node build.js && webpack --config webpack.config.mjs && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chromium

author: mozilla
